pr_title: Fix & clean join test wrt dynamic filtering

timeline.bodyText: I think we can remove it. There is no big benefit of this tests.
timeline.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText: I cannot say I agree because of #3149 (comment)
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: again I think it's unneeded. For example, we test joins with spill only in the engine: io.prestosql.tests.TestSpilledJoinQueries
replies.author: sopel39

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure we really care about this setup. Maybe add a TODO: remove after few releases
timeline.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText:
DF is pretty invasive, affects certain code areas, like CBO, reorder joins, PPD.
As long as we have a toggle to turn it on/off, we should have tests for both scenarios.
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText:
As long as we have a toggle to turn it on/off, we should have tests for both scenarios.

We have plenty of feature toggles in FeaturesConfig yet we don't do large scale tests with them on/off.
replies.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText:
I can't name a feature toggle that impacts as many code areas as this one.
If there are such, we should do large scale tests for them too.
replies.author: findepi

timeline.message:
Run Join test queries for Hive with dynamic filtering disabled too

Since enabling dynamic filtering by default,
`TestHiveDistributedJoinQueries` and
`TestHiveDistributedJoinQueriesWithDynamicFiltering` were testing with
the same setup. This commit restore testing coverage with and without
dynamic filtering.
Run Join tests with dynamic filtering disabled too

Remove redundant setup

Dynamic filtering is enabled by default and this class is not
dynamic-filtering-specific.

Remove redundant setup

Dynamic filtering is enabled by default and this class is not
dynamic-filtering-specific.

timeline.author: sopel39
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,10 +9,9 @@ hive.allow-rename-column=true
 hive.metastore.authentication.type=KERBEROS
 hive.metastore.service.principal=hive/_HOST@LABS.TERADATA.COM
 # When using HDFS impersonation we talk to HDFS as session user configured in tempto (which is 'hive')
-# However, TODO we don't have Metastore impersonation yet; when DROP TABLE is issued,
-# Metastore needs to be able to delete the table files on HDFS, otherwise they be silently left behind,
-# potentially causing some further tests to fail. For this reason, `hive.metastore.client.principal` needs
-# to match session user configured in tempto.
+# However, when DROP TABLE is issued, Metastore needs to be able to delete the table files on HDFS,

replies.bodyText: this is a separate commit. do you want me to move this commit to a separate PR?
replies.author: findepi

+package io.prestosql.tests;
+
+import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap;
+import io.prestosql.testing.AbstractTestJoinQueries;
+import io.prestosql.testing.QueryRunner;
+import io.prestosql.tests.tpch.TpchQueryRunnerBuilder;
+import org.testng.annotations.Test;
+
+/**
+ * @see TestJoinQueries for tests with dynamic filtering enabled
+ */
+public class TestJoinQueriesWithoutDynamicFiltering
+        extends AbstractTestJoinQueries
+{
+    @Override
+    protected QueryRunner createQueryRunner()
+            throws Exception
+    {
+        return TpchQueryRunnerBuilder.builder()
+                .setExtraProperties(ImmutableMap.of("enable-dynamic-filtering", "false"))
